```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(data.table)
q<- read_csv("Questions_trunc.csv")
view(q)
a<- read_csv("Answers_trunc.csv")
view(a)
```
***Do people who answer more questions get better scores
```{r}
merge<-left_join(a,q, by = "Id")
merge
```

```{r}
merge%>%
 ggplot(mapping = aes(Id, Score.x)) +
    geom_smooth()
```

Question: Do the latter on Ids have better scores or worse scores?
Answer: As you can see from the graoph the latter Ids get a lot lower of scores on the answers.
